I the web
and the people that build it.

A little about me:

I work with the awesome team at Envy Labs , doing front-end work for projects including Code School. Because I'm (probably a little too) social, I tweet a lot , attend as many meetups and conferences as possible, share my thoughts via posts and quick thoughts and even run a front-end conf with the help of my awesome wife, Cherrie.

There's more to the story: I'm a husband, dad, traveler, music lover and a foodie but most of my sharing on here is about the interwebs.
